key.name: addressbook-source
key.description: Address book to use for storing automatically synced contacts.

key.name: auto-sync-gaim
key.description: Whether Pidgin contacts should be automatically synced.

key.name: enable
key.description: Whether contacts should be automatically added to the user’s address book.

key.name: file-under-as-first-last
key.summary: Whether to set “File under” field as “First Last”
key.description: Set File under as “First Last”, instead of “Last, First”.

key.name: gaim-addressbook-source
key.description: Address book to use for storing automatically synced contacts from Pidgin.

key.name: gaim-check-interval
key.description: Check interval for Pidgin syncing of contacts.
